body.name: TV Wall Mount for Most 26-60 inch Flat/Curved TVs up to 77lbs, Full Motion Wall Mount TV Braket with Articulating arm Swivel Tilt Extension, Single Stud Corner TV Monitor Mount Max VESA 400x400mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 27 mins
features: Strong & Stable: This TV wall mount is constructed of solid reinforced steel to support up to 77 lbs. Thicker articulating arms ensure long-lasting durability to securely hold your TV without wobbling or shaking.

Optimal Viewing Comfort: Featuring 180° swivel, +5°/-15° tilt, and 18.7” extension, this full motion TV mount provides the best view from any seat in the room. Simply direct the TV toward your position for less screen glare and more comfort.

Wide Compatibility: This articulating TV mount fits most 26”-60” TVs up to 77 lbs with VESA patterns 75x75 to 400x400mm. Please verify the size, weight and VESA mounting pattern of your TV before purchase.

Mount Your TV In a Corner: The TV wall mount features a single stud design, making it perfect for corner mounting. Mount your TV in the living room, kitchen, bedroom, office, or any room with only one stud required.

Easy to Install: Includes step-by-step instructions and mounting hardware to make the TV wall mount installation a breeze. Post-installation leveling (+/-3°) makes it easy to perfectly position your TV after mounting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AM alphamount Full Motion TV Wall Mount | The Single-Stud TV Mount Solution The full motion TV wall mount 26"-60" offers a single-stud solution that features swivel, tilt, and flexible arm extension, makes it easy to install your TV in a corner.
Thicker articulating arms ensure long-lasting durability to securely hold your TV on wall.
Make sure check your TV as above before purchase and Do not mount on drywall alone!
Enjoy the best view no matter where you sit in the room.

Benefits of TV wall mount Safety. Hang TV on the wall is a good way to reduce the chances of any injury caused by a TV tipping over. Our full motion Single stud TV mount with strong articulating arms was built in high qualified steels, it can strongly keep your TV safe on the wall to prevent your TV from accidental bumping.Space-Saving. TV wall mount will save you valuable space by hanging TV on the wall. This articulating TV wall mount with extension feature is not only able to retract 2.3 inch/extend out to 18.7 inch for your comfortable viewing experience, but also improve the layout of your room.Eliminate screen glare & eyes fatigue. +5°/-15° tilting feature will reduce or completely eliminate the screen glaring, you can adjust the tilting angle to fit your viewing position.Flexibility adjustment. With +90°/-90° Swivel, ±3º leveling after installation, this TV wall mount is flexible to fit most position for your room for viewing, every seat can be the best seat in the room.Single-Stud design. Thanks to the single stud design, you can put this wall mount TV bracket almost anywhere on the wall. No enough wall space on your home or office to mount a TV? Have to sacrifice your decoration and layout to settle you TV? Just mounting your TV in a corner to opens up a world of possibilities and flexibility. This tv mount is a perfect solution If you need to put you TV in a corner.Easy Installation. Single stud full-Motion TV Mount Bracket allows you to drill only once/find ONE stud instead of TWO to mount your TV on wall. With necessary hardware and vivid user manual, installation can be finished in about 30 minutes. Good quality hardware and assembly parts allows to install TV mount on concrete/brick walls, and wood stud walls, Make sure you WON'T install it on dry wall alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our needs
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mount so we could add a 32” TV to my teenage son’s bedroom. There wasn’t really a good surface to put it on and not really a good wall space for it either. So I picked this mount because it had a long enough arm to allow the TV to stick out perpendicular to the wall at the foot of his bed. This mount worked exactly as we wanted. It’s heavier duty than I expected for the price (it’s heavy, make sure you get the bolts into a stud!). It also has the ability to adjust the levelness of the TV once installed, and the ability to tilt it so you have the right viewing angle. This mount also makes it so he could actually watch the TV from anywhere in his room. Highly recommend this mount if you need your TV to not sit flat against the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why pay $60 when you can spend $20
reviews.reviewText: I looked at Wal-Mart, Target etc and everything was over $50. I found this product and thought I’d try it because anything was better than the broken one I had. It came with all the parts and then some. Works like a dream and was easy for me (36f) to install my husbands 55” tv by myself. I recommend it highly for the price but the quality was good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does a good job
reviews.reviewText: I don't really like this type of tv mount because they seem less stable than the ones that don't swivel but we needed one to swivel for our media room. It is actually much more sturdy than I thought it would be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product, easy to assemble and install. Sturdy enough to hold my 50" tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TV wall mount
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works great so far. Mounted a 54 in TV. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my new 58” tv
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and supports the tv. The horizontal adjustment is great. However the vertical tilt is which that you set it and have to tighten a bolt to hold it where it’s set so it’s not easily adjustable for vertical tilt. It’s a good buy for the price and I recommend it.
